name: Get some static text on a web page

elements.name: Generate a static web page with a `h1` and a `p` tag

steps.name: a static file
hints:
pass a static fail via the "ENTRY_POINT" environment variable as in

ENTRY_POINT=path/to/my/file docker-compose up

steps.name: it has a "h1" with the text "Welcome to Real Code Problems"
hints:
need a "h1" html tag as in

Welcome to Real Code Problems

steps.name: the following elements with text
hints:
need a "h1" html tag as in

Welcome to Real Code Problems

need a "p" html tag as in

Real code problems help you learn how to code while solving real problems.
